name: obsidian-ui-studio
description: Obsidian UI Studio provides a full front-end component builder inside Obsidian. Create HTML/CSS/JS widgets using SCSS, Stylus, Pug, and Babel, then compile and embed them directly into Canvas with one click. Build interactive UI elements without leaving your vault.

scripts.clean-files: if exist main.js del main.js & if exist componentStudioView.js del componentStudioView.js & del dist\*.js
scripts.clean: npm run clean-files && npm run clean-dir
scripts.build: npm run clean && rollup -c && npm run deploy-to-vault
scripts.deploy-to-vault: copy main.js "%npm_package_config_vault_plugin_path%" /Y & copy styles.css "%npm_package_config_vault_plugin_path%" /Y & copy manifest.json "%npm_package_config_vault_plugin_path%" /Y
